name: Jimbob's Store!
description:
Welcome To Jimbob's Store!

this is pretty much a game i have made with someone called t0mmy nuggetz

also it a baldi fangame cuz yessir

Story

(THIS WAS WRITTEN BY T0MMY)

You need to go to circle K but its closed so you go to jimvbob's store a place you have never heard of.
You are also broke so you steal all the 4 items and leave.

How To Play

W A S D to move

Shift to run

Left Click to interact

Steal 4 items then escape da store to win

Credits
